blogs.title: Nature’s Wonders: Live Sea Turtles at Isla Solara’s Shores
blogs.description: Guests at StayNest were delighted to spot live sea turtles gracefully swimming in the crystal-clear waters of Isla Solara—a rare and magical experience that showcases the island’s vibrant marine life.
